san-lo-mvu13:16: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || kṣetram iti ||
san-lo-mvu13:21: tāni niśamya vākyāni śāsanaṁ ca naravara ||
san-lo-mvu13:25: evam ukte āyuṣmāṁ mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || kiṁ punar bho jinaputra sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu utpadyanti samyaksaṁbuddhā utāho keṣucid eva utpadyanti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapaṁ gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu13:36: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapa āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || khalu bho jinaputra ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yaṁ ekasmiṁ kṣetre dvau samyaksaṁbuddhau nopapadyanti iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapaṁ gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣate ||
san-lo-mvu13:39: tat sarvaṁ paripūreti eṣā buddhāna dharmatā ||
san-lo-mvu13:43: tasmāt duve na jāyante ekakṣetre nararṣabhau ||
san-lo-mvu13:46: anāgatā atikrāntā saṁbuddhā ye ca sāṁprataṁ |
san-lo-mvu13:49: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || katamāni bho jinaputra samprati anyāni buddhakṣetrāṇi yatraitarhi samyaksaṁbuddhā dharmaṁ deśayantīti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapaṁ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu13:58: tatra jñānadhvajo nāma śāstā śāsati prāṇināṁ ||
san-lo-mvu13:79: yathā saṁsāracakrasya pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:80: tathāiva lokadhātūnāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:81: atikrāntānāṁ buddhānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:82: praṇidhentāna bodhāya pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:85: tuṣiteṣu vasantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:86: tuṣitebhyaś cyavantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:87: mātu kukṣau śayantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:88: sthitānāṁ mātuḥ kukṣau tu pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:89: jāyamānānāṁ vīrāṇāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |

san-lo-mvu13:91: aṅkeṣu gṛhyamāṇānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:92: pādāni vikramantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:93: mahāhāsaṁ hasantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:94: diśāṁ vilokayantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:95: aṅkena dhāriyantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:96: upanīyamānānāṁ gandharvaiḥ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:97: pūrebhyo niṣkramantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:98: bodhimūlam upentānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:99: prāpnuvantānāṁ tathāgatajñānaṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:100: dharmacakraṁ pravartentānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:101: satvakoṭī vinentānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:102: siṁhanādaṁ nadantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:103: āyuḥsaṁskāraṁ utsṛjantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:104: nirvāyantānāṁ vīrāṇāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:105: nirvṛtānāṁ śayantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:106: dhyāpiyantānāṁ vīrāṇāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:108: kvacit kvacit ca saṁbuddho buddhakṣetreṣu dṛśyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:110: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || yadi bho jinaputrā ettakā samyaksaṁbuddhā eko ca samyaksaṁbuddho aparimitān satvā parinirvāpayati nanu acireṇa kālena sarvasatvān parinirvāpayiṣyanti | evam ayaṁ lokaḥ sarveṇa sarvaśūnyaṁ bhaviṣyati sarvasatvavirahita iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapa gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu13:117: paryanto bheṣyati satvānām iti uktaṁ maharṣiṇeti ||
san-lo-mvu13:119: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || ye ime bho  jinaputra satvā samyaksaṁbodhāye praṇidhenti te te katibhir ākāraiḥ ṣaṣṭhyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ saptamāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanta iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapam uvāca || dubhi khalu bho dhutadharmadhara ākārair bodhisatvā bodhāya praṇidhento ṣaṣṭhyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ saptamāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti || katamehi dubhi || saṁjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyo ca spṛhayanti yasmiṁś ca kāle samyaksaṁbuddhā satvaparijñayā ahaṁ mahātmā śamīkaro tti devatāṁ satkṛtya avahitaśrotā śṛṇvanti || ye hi kecid bho dhutadharmadhara bodhisatvāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ saptamāyāṁ bhūmau vivartensu vivartanti vivartiṣyanti vā sarve imehi dubhi ākārehi vivartanti vivartensu vivartiṣyanti iti ||
san-lo-mvu13:121: evaṁ eṣā ṣaṣṭhī bhūmir bhavati teṣāṁ guṇavarāṇāṁ |
